#summary This page explains how to include CSS documents to the QTI content definition

= Introduction =

The Assessment definition or Assessment Item definition documens could contain the reference to the external CSS files. 


= Details =
{{{
<assessmentItem>

<styleDeclaration>
  <link href="choice_single_style.css" userAgent=".*"/>
</styleDeclaration>

<itemBody>
<p>blah blah blah</p>
</itemBody>
</assessmentItem>
}}}
